TextView.android:text: Service Charges and work flow\n\n Service charges are based on inspection and repair cost Visiting charge is ₹49/-even if no service is taken Total cost will be service/repair cost+₹49/-. Service will be started if customer agree to pay total cost. Total cost will be input by user and proceed to payment Payment will be done only after service. Background checked and trained mechanic will reach you Same working day service guarantee
